game.name: Air Warfare
game.description:
Do you think that you are good at flying an airplane? Is becoming a pilot in future is your hobby? Join Air Warfare and get ready to practice your airplane flying abilities in a friendly and lovely space environment! Many dangerous enemy planes and other obstacles will keep coming at you and your job is to finish them with the use of bullets your plane is lashed with. Put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen to destroy all your enemy aircraft, collect supplies, fuel and first-aid kits in this brand new adventure game!
There are plenty of enemy battle jets are waiting for you in this endless battle mode. Your attentive mind and expertise in controlling a plane will help you to secure the best score. Use the arrow keys to move your plane left and right or upward or download to avoid the collision with enemy planes!  Keep cleaning as many enemies as you can to wear the crown of an ace pilot in this html5 flying game! Track your health, first-aid kits, fuel and how many enemy planes you have killed by looking at the top of the screen!
The realistic air ware fare simulation, intense fights in the sky, amazing graphics and sounds as well as the smooth flying controls will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long. Many more advanced weapons like special missiles and machine guns to upgrade further. Take your seat in this lovely plane and get ready to enjoy an authentic flying experience! We have countless mobile shooter games for boys and girls that are playable on multiple devices, no download required.
